transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji Piyush sir baat kare Kaveri text. Ha mere mera wo kon hai executive?
Executive: Ha mai hi hu sir Amrit.
Customer: Hai?
Executive: Mai mai hi baat karu sir aap executive bhi baat kar raha hu mai Amrit baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Nahi jo product add karayega wo kon hai?
Executive: Sir aapka account manager mai hi hu jo bhi problem aap mujhse bata sakte hai kya karna hai.
Customer: Add product add karane ke liye.
Executive: Product add karane ke liye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir aap Google meet pe ek baar connect ho jaiye. Aur
Customer: Abhi thodi der thodi der me thodi der me karta hu laptop le aaun thik hai.
Executive: Accha accha to system se karenge na aap?
Customer: System se ha.
Executive: Thik hai kitne baje sir?
Customer: Abhi ek dedh ho raha hai dedh baje kareeb.
Executive: Dedh baje.
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add a product.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to connect on Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect at 1:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product, google meet, account manager
